description:
Hello Gentlemen!
I believe that the best relationships begin with great friendships, so let’s start there!
I am a proud parent who loves God, live jazz music, reading thriller books, and enjoy cooking. I don’t drink or smoke, and I want my partner to be the same. I surround myself with likeminded people and I hope to one day meet my equally yoked match. Could this be you? Let’s find out. If you don’t mind dating a Queen who has princes/princesses, drop by and say hello.
